item.description:
Hi!

The space was not available on Saturday September 26th. Please adjust your RSVP if this change no longer fits your schedule or pay to reserve your seat. Thank you for being flexible as we settle into our new space.

Join us to share what you have manifested since the last meetup. If you're just learning how to consciously attract what you want in your life, bring questions and an open mind.

We will meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.

Dunkin Donuts is next door if you would like to grab something on the way in. I will have bottled water. Plenty of on street parking.

If the front door is locked, please use the door on the driveway side.

See you there!

Julie
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Red house next to Dunkin Donuts. If the front door is locked, go to the door next to driveway.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Night Meetup
